name: Peaceful aquarium
description:
Lost time due to real life.

Use your trusty mouse. Shoot fishes. Enjoy the silence.

Assets used:
https://www.kenney.nl/assets/shooting-gallery
https://www.kenney.nl/assets/fish-pack

Tools used:
Godot & gimp

Source:
https://github.com/madeso/kenneyjam2019

History:
Based on a earlier game by myself in unity that sadly is more complete: https://github.com/madeso/fishhunt
